resource: 1001889.vtc=true 1001889.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001889.description=CAUTION! When driving a hybrid vehicle, pay special attention to the area around the vehicle. Because there is little vehicle noise in electric-only mode, pedestrians, people riding bicycles or other people and vehicles in the area may not be aware of the vehicle starting off or approaching them, so take extra care while driving. 1001889.derived=false
